description: File defining an FNF album usable by the songs in freeplay

version.description: The version number for the Album data file format.

name.description: A readable name for the album.

artists.description: The artists of the album, aka the ones who created the assets.

albumArtAsset.description: The asset path to the album art which will be displayed in Freeplay.

albumTitleAsset.description: The asset path to the album title which will be displayed below the album art in Freeplay.

albumTitleOffsets.description: The global offset to the album's position, in pixels.

offsets.description: Offset from the prop's real position when playing this animation.

flipY.description: Whethever to flip Y axis of this prop when playing this animation.

frameRate.description: How many frames to play of this animation in 1 second.

prefix.description: Prefix of all frames making up this animations. Optional for 'Packer' props.

name.description: A name of this prop's animation.

looped.description: Whethever this animation should repeat itself after it finishes.

flipX.description: Whethever to flip X axis of this prop when playing this animation

frameIndices.description: A list of frame numbers to use for this animation. Empty list will use all available frames.
